document.full_text: japan said on tuesday there was no need to extend a 20 km (12 mile) evacuation zone around its tsunami-damaged nuclear plant, despite elevated radiation readings outside the area.
document.title: japan: no-man's zone large enough despite radiation
lines_and_colors: japan said on tuesday there was no need to extend a 20 km (12 mile) evacuation zone around its tsunami-damaged nuclear plant, despite elevated radiation readings outside the area.
